order.Price.description: Price with it's currency and textual representation

reference.CountryEnum.description: All country prices accessible from a reference

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

manualPayment.description: The service needs to be manually renewed and paid

service.RenewalTypeEnum.description: Detailed renewal type of a service

canDeleteAtExpiration.description: Indicates that the service can be set up to be deleted at expiration

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

callBack.description: URL called when state of a sent SMS changes

channel.description: For what purpose this account can be used for

creditThresholdForAutomaticRecredit.description: Credit threshold after which an automatic recredit is launched

smpp.description: Whether the account can be used for smpp or not

stopCallBack.description: URL called when a STOP is received after a receiver replied stop to a SMS

sms.AlertThreshold.description: A structure describing all information about alert threshold informations

action.description: Action to perform on the provided IPs

ips.description: List of IPs to add or remove

errors.description: Details on error(s) on the batch, if any

estimatedCredits.description: The estimated cost of the batch in credits

finishedAt.description: Datetime when the batch finished processing SMSs

processedRecords.description: Number of processed records in this batch

sentAt.description: Datetime when the SMSs of the batch are sent (based on deferred time if exists)

startedAt.description: Datetime when the batch started processing SMSs

totalRecords.description: Total number of records in this batch

from.description: SMS sender. Either "from" or "senderForResponse" must be passed

senderForResponse.description: Ask to compute a sender that allows response. Either "from" or "senderForResponse" must be passed

slotID.description: SMS receivers slot ID. Either "to" or "slotID" must be passed

to.description: SMS receivers list. Either "to" or "slotID" must be passed

credits.description: The cost of the batch in credits, computed during batch processing

delivered.description: Number of SMS that are delivered

estimatedCredits.description: The estimated cost of the batch in credits, computed before batch processing

pending.description: Number of SMS that are in pending status

sent.description: Number of SMS that are sent to the broker

stoplisted.description: Number of SMS that received a STOP by the receiver

sms.BillingCountryEnum.description: Countries where we sell SMS credits

batchID.description: ID of the batch responsible of the blacklist

smsOutgoingID.description: ID of the outgoing SMS responsible of the blacklist

sms.ChannelEnum.description: In case of smpp the channel can not be "both"

sms.ChatAccess.description: The web access for your virtual number chat application

creationDate.description: The creation date of this access

url.description: The url of the web access

sms.ClassEnum.description: The sms class of sms sending job

sms.CountryEnum.description: All country suffixes accessible for sms services and "all" available

credit.description: Credits consumed by sending one SMS towards the given destination

price.description: Price of one SMS sent towards the given destination

restrictionCode.description: The type of routing restriction imposed by the operator

substitution.description: The substitution sender used to bypass operator filter

sms.HlrLookupNumber.description: Home Location Register informations. Give informations about a given cellular phone.

operatorCode.description: The {Mobile Country Code, Mobile Network Code} unique identifier

ported.description: Has the MSISDN been ported from its original network

roaming.description: Is the MSISDN currently roaming outside its natinal network

sms.Incoming.description: Sms history of sms incoming received

sms.JobEstimate.description: A structure describing the encoding, length and number of SMS parts of a text message

characters.description: The number of characters the message contains, including invisible escaped characters

charactersClass.description: The characters class that will be used to send the SMS, depending on characters in message

maxCharactersPerPart.description: The number of characters every SMS part can contain, depending on characters class and quantity of parts

parts.description: The quantity of SMS parts the message will be split in

batchID.description: ID of batch linked to the SMS

tariffCode.description: Tariff code applied on the sms

credit.description: Credits consumed by sending one SMS towards the given destination

creditPrice.description: Price of one credit, including pack's promotion

creditQuantityMax.description: Maximum quantity (excluded) of credit to order to have this price

creditQuantityMin.description: Minimum quantity (included) of credit to order to have this price

discountCreditPrice.description: Price of one credit, during a promotional event

discountPercentage.description: Percentage applied as part of a promotional event

discountSmsPrice.description: Price of one SMS, during a promotional event

smsPrice.description: Price of one SMS sent towards the given destination, including pack's promotion

smsQuantityMax.description: Maximum quantity (excluded) of SMS you can obtain with this pack

smsQuantityMin.description: Minimum quantity (included) of SMS you can obtain with this pack

sms.PackOffer.description: A structure describing all information about an sms pack offer

phoneKey.description: Phone key identifier between the phone and phonebooks

homeMobile.description: Home mobile phone number of the contact

homePhone.description: Home landline phone number of the contact

workMobile.description: Mobile phone office number of the contact

workPhone.description: Landline phone office number of the contact

sms.PriorityEnum.description: The priority of an sms sending

sms.Quota.description: A structure describing all information about quota informations

autoUpdate.description: Download file from URL before sending to contacts (works only with csvUrl and not document ID)

canAutoUpdate.description: Is the object compatible with autoUpdate

records.description: Number of receiver records in the document

sms.ReceiversAsynchronousCleanReport.description: A structure giving operation price and asynchronous task ID

sms.Response.description: A structure describing how to manage an sms Response

cgiUrl.description: Default url callback used for a given response.

text.description: Automatic notification sent by text in case of customer reply.

sms.RestrictionCodeEnum.description: Restriction type used by the operator to filter sms.

referer.description: Specify if the sender is custom or not

sms.SenderAvailable.description: A structure describing all information about senders available

sms.SenderRefererEnum.description: The referer of the available sender

endpoints.description: Addresses of the TLS and non-TLS endpoints

throughput.description: Number of messages allowed per seconds

secured.description: address of the TLS endpoint: domain:port

unsecured.description: address of the non-TLS endpoint: domain:port

sms.SmsSendingReport.description: A structure describing all information about quota informations

sms.StatusSenderEnum.description: All existing status for a given referer

sms.SupportEnum.description: The media support used to be contacted in case of alert

sms.TemplateControl.description: Sms template for moderation (Needed to send in US country)

message.description: Message pattern to be moderated. Use "#VALUE#" format for dynamic text area.

sms.Templates.description: A structure describing all information about templates informations

sms.TypeSenderEnum.description: All existing types for a given sender

sms.TypeTemplateEnum.description: All existing types for a given template

callBack.description: URL called when state of a sent SMS changes

stopCallBack.description: URL called when a STOP is received after a receiver replied stop to a SMS

countryCode.description: The ISO formated country code of the number
The ISO formated country code of the number

sms.VirtualNumberIsoCountryCodeEnum.description: The ISO formated country code of the number

message.description: Potential failure reason of the task

objectCreated.description: Object potentially created at the end of the task
